00023 complex double ampg1[4*HODIMMAX];
00024 complex double ampg2[4*HODIMMAX];
00025 
00026 
00027 // we are recacalculating the amplitudes for the single-particle
00028 // states again and again !
00029 
00030 // not ease to solve in present framework, let's hope that it's
00031 // fast enough like it is
00032 
00033 static void ob_densmatho(DensityMatrixHOPar* par,
00034                          const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00035                          const GaussianAux* X, complex double* rho)
00036 {
00037   int nmax = par->nmax;
00038   double omega = par->omega;
00039   int dim = par->dim;
00040 
00041   amplitudesHOGaussian(G1, nmax, omega, ampg1);
00042   amplitudesHOGaussian(G2, nmax, omega, ampg2);
00043   
00044   int i,j;
00045   for (j=0; j<dim; j++)
00046    for (i=0; i<dim; i++)
00047      rho[i+j*dim] += conj(ampg1[i])*ampg2[j];
00048 }
00049   
00050 
00051 // density matrix needs not be real ?
00052 void calcDensityMatrixHO(const DensityMatrixHOPar* par, 
00053                          const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00054                          complex double* rho)
00055 {
00056   int d = par->dim;
00057 
00058   OneBodyOperator op_ob_densmatho = { dim: d*d, opt: 0, par: par, 
00059                                       me: ob_densmatho };
00060 
00061   calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Q, X);
00062   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Q, X, &op_ob_densmatho, rho);
00063 
00064   int i;
00065   for (i=0; i<d*d; i++)
00066     rho[i] /= X->ovlap;
00067 }
00068

00089 int ngwork = 0;
00090 complex double *ampgwork;
00091 complex double *ampgpwork;
00092 
00093 
00094 void calcDensityMatrixHOod(const DensityMatrixHOPar* par,
00095                            const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00096                            const SlaterDetAux* X,
00097                            complex double* rho)
00098 {
00099   int A=Q->A; 
00100   int ngauss=Q->ngauss; int ngaussp=Qp->ngauss;
00101   int* idx=Q->idx; int* idxp=Qp->idx; 
00102   int* ng=Q->ng; int* ngp=Qp->ng;
00103   Gaussian* G=Q->G; Gaussian* Gp=Qp->G;
00104   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00105   complex double* o=X->o;
00106   complex double ovl = X->ovlap;
00107 
00108   int nmax = par->nmax;
00109   double omega = par->omega;
00110   int dim = par->dim;
00111 
00112   if (ngwork != Q->A*MAXNG) {
00113     ngwork = Q->A*MAXNG;
00114     ampgwork = malloc(ngwork*dim*sizeof(complex double));
00115     ampgpwork = malloc(ngwork*dim*sizeof(complex double));
00116   }
00117 
00118   complex double (*ampg)[dim] = ampgwork;
00119   complex double (*ampgp)[dim] = ampgpwork;
00120 
00121   int i;
00122   for (i=0; i<ngauss; i++)
00123     amplitudesHOGaussian(&G[i], nmax, omega, ampg[i]);
00124   for (i=0; i<ngaussp; i++)
00125     amplitudesHOGaussian(&Gp[i], nmax, omega, ampgp[i]);
00126 
00127   int k,l, ki,li, ik,il;
00128 
00129   for (i=0; i<dim*dim; i++)
00130     rho[i] = 0.0;
00131 
00132   for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00133     for (k=0; k<A; k++) {
00134 
00135       for (li=0; li<ngp[l]; li++)
00136         for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++)
00137           
00138           for (il=0; il<dim; il++)
00139             for (ik=0; ik<dim; ik++)
00140               rho[ik+il*dim] += 
00141                 conj(ampg[idx[k]+ki][ik])* ampgp[idx[l]+li][il]*
00142                 o[l+k*A]*ovl;
00143 
00144     }           
00145 }
